lines: HARPER: Welcome to FriendForge! Ready to meet your new friends?
TINK: Ooh, I get to show off my latest invention!
VELVET: Darling, our guest is here. Be fabulous!
SQUEAK: I hope I help... um, hi...
ZING: Let's party! I'll start the music!
WATT & NOTCH: We're already liveâ€”bring on the jokes!
